title: Francesco Farioli - Wikipedia
snippet: Farioli studied philosophy and later sports science at the University of Florence. He began his coaching career with Margine Coperta, a lower-division Italian football club, where he was goalkeeping coach from 2009 to 2011.

title: Francesco Farioli: Age, Net Worth, Career, Family & More - Mabumbe
snippet: Below is a detailed breakdown of his life, career, and legacy. Francesco Farioli was born in Rome, Italy, on April 11, 1987, to a family that appreciated the values of hard work and dedication.

title: Francesco Farioli - FC Porto - Coach Profile
snippet: Francesco Farioli is a 36-year-old Football coach born in Barga, Italy on 1989-04-10, who currently coaches FC Porto, in Portugal.

title: Francesco Farioli - Player Profile & Stats
snippet: Francesco Farioli is a 36-year-old Football ex-player. Born in Barga on 1989-04-10, he played as Goalkeeper.
